t: Russell Brand: Movies, TV, and Bio
s: Russell Brand was born on June 4, 1975, in Grays, Essex, England, the son of Barbara Elizabeth (Nichols) and Ronald Henry Brand, a photographer. An only child, his parents divorced when he was only six months old, and he was subsequently raised by his mother.

Russell Brand. Producer: Arthur. Russell Brand was born on June 4, 1975, in Grays, Essex, England, the son of Barbara Elizabeth (Nichols) and Ronald Henry Brand, a photographer. An only child, his parents divorced when he was only six months old, and he was subsequently raised by his mother.

t: X Brands: Movies, TV, and Bio
s: X Brands was born on 24 July 1927 in Kansas City, Missouri, USA. He was an actor, known for Yancy Derringer (1958), The Monroes (1966) and The High Chaparral (1967). He was married to Pamela McInnes and Jean Dorothy Merriam.
